---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  description: PlaceOS REST-API description
  title: rest-api
  version: v2
paths:
  /api/engine/v2/api_keys:
    get:
      summary: returns a list of the API keys associated with the provided domain,
        otherwise all domains
      tags:
      - ApiKeys
      operationId: PlaceOS::Api::ApiKeys#index
      parameters:
      - name: authority_id
        in: query
        description: the ID of the domain to be listed
        example: auth-12345
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      - name: q
        in: query
        description: returns results based on a [simple query string](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl-simple-query-string-query.html)
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: limit
        in: query
        description: the maximum number of results to return
        example: "10000"
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: UInt32
      - name: offset
        in: query
        description: deprecated, the starting offset of the result set. Used to implement
          pagination
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: UInt32
      - name: ref
        in: query
        description: a token for accessing the next page of results, provided in the
          `Link` header
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/PlaceOS__Model__ApiKey__PublicResponse'
        409:
          description: Conflict
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PlaceOS__Api__Application__CommonError'
        401:
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PlaceOS__Api__Application__CommonError'
        403:
          description: Forbidden
        404:
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PlaceOS__Api__Application__CommonError'
        408:
          description: Request Timeout
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PlaceOS__Api__Application__CommonError'
        400:
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:

                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PlaceOS__Api__Application__ParameterError'
        422:
          description: Unprocessable Entity
          content:

        406:

    get:
      summary: return a list of modules configured on the cluster
      tags:
      - Modules
      operationId: PlaceOS::Api::Modules#index
      parameters:
      - name: as_of
        in: query
        description: only return modules updated before this time (unix epoch)
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: Int64
          nullable: true
      - name: control_system_id
        in: query
        description: only return modules running in this system (query params are

        example: sys-1234
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      - name: connected
        in: query
        description: only return modules with a particular connected state
        example: "true"
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
          nullable: true
      - name: driver_id
        in: query
        description: only return instances of this driver
        example: driver-1234
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      - name: no_logic
        in: query
        description: do not return logic modules (return only modules that can exist
          in multiple systems)
        example: "true"
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      - name: running
        in: query
        description: return only running modules
        example: "true"
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
          nullable: true
      - name: q

  /api/engine/v2/systems:
    get:
      summary: list the systems in a cluster
      tags:
      - Systems
      operationId: PlaceOS::Api::Systems#index
      parameters:
      - name: bookable
        in: query
        description: return only bookable or non-bookable rooms (returns both when
          not specified)
        example: "true"
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
          nullable: true
      - name: capacity
        in: query
        description: return only rooms with capacity equal or greater than that provided
        example: "5"
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: Int32
          nullable: true
      - name: email
        in: query
        description: return only systems whos resource address match one of the emails
          provided
        example: room@org.com,room2@org.com
        required: false
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          nullable: true
      - name: features
        in: query
        description: return only rooms who have all of the features requested
        example: whiteboard,vidconf,display
        required: false
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
          nullable: true
      - name: module_id
        in: query
        description: return only systems which have the module id provided
        example: mod-1234
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      - name: trigger_id
        in: query
        description: return systems which are using the trigger id provided
        example: trig-1234
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      - name: zone_id
        in: query
        description: return systems which are in the zone provided
        example: zone-1234
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      - name: q
        in: query
        description: returns results based on a [simple query string](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl-simple-query-string-query.html)
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: limit
        in: query
        description: the maximum number of results to return
        example: "10000"
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: UInt32
      - name: offset
        in: query
        description: deprecated, the starting offset of the result set. Used to implement
          pagination
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: UInt32
      - name: ref
        in: query
        description: a token for accessing the next page of results, provided in the
          `Link` header
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:

      tags:

      operationId: PlaceOS::Api::Schema#index
      parameters:
      - name: q
        in: query

        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: limit
        in: query
        description: the maximum number of results to return
        example: "10000"
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: UInt32
      - name: offset
        in: query
        description: deprecated, the starting offset of the result set. Used to implement
          pagination
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: UInt32
      - name: ref

          `Link` header
